Text:
Title....: Delhii Heights
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/a1UKe3hiAAFifXQE-Delhii_Heights
Genres...: Drama, Romance
Year.....: 2007
Rating...: 4.7/10 with 28 ratings
Plot.....: The story revolves around 13 people living in Delhii Heights-an apartment in New Delhi,India.There's Suhana(Neha Dhupia) and Abi(Jimmy Shergill),newlyweds who work for rival companies.Next comes a lively and joyful Sikh named Timmy Kohli(Om Puri),his wife Ruby(Khamini Khanna),and his 2 daughters.Then there's flirtatious Bobby(Rohit Roy) and his wife Saima(Simone Singh).Also, there's Lucky(Vivek Shauq),a funny cricket bookie with quite a personality.And finally,there are four boys living in Delhii Heights,who are always chasing girls and pulling pranks on each other.How these residents' lives play out and intertwine are the highlights of the film.
Filmed in: India
Language.: Hindi
